home.title: Hi! I'm Hrithik Pawar
home.description: I am a Bachelor's student at Shivaji University, Kolhapur pursuing a B.Tech degree in Computer Science and Technology. I have a passion for converting ideas into reality with the Machine Learning approach. I work with various Web Development frameworks from Python and Javascript family and introduce them with my Machine Learning abilities.
